metadata.description: A comprehensive collection of Claude Code plugins for system administration, development, and productivity workflows

plugins.name: ai-tools
plugins.description: Claude Code plugin for AI tool management, MCP server configuration, and AI workflow automation slash commands and agents.

plugins.name: claude-code
plugins.description: Claude Code plugin for managing Claude Code configuration, slash commands, agents, and plugin development workflow.

plugins.name: conda-management
plugins.description: Claude Code plugin for managing Conda environments, packages, and Python virtual environment workflows.

plugins.name: context-toolkit
plugins.description: A comprehensive toolkit implementing the CONTEXT.md workflow system for managing human-authored context and agent-ready briefings, bridging natural expression and AI-optimized formats.

plugins.name: debugging
plugins.description: Claude Code plugin for debugging workflows, error analysis, troubleshooting assistance, and diagnostic tools.

plugins.name: docker-asist
plugins.description: Claude Code plugin for Docker container management, containerization workflows, and Docker troubleshooting assistance.

plugins.name: development
plugins.description: Claude Code plugin for software development workflows, code generation, refactoring, and general development assistance.

plugins.name: git-github
plugins.description: Claude Code plugin for Git version control, GitHub repository management, and collaborative development workflows.

plugins.name: home-budget-helper
plugins.description: A workspace template for household budget management using Claude Code CLI with predefined agents, slash commands, and directory structures for transaction processing, budget creation, expense analysis, goal tracking, and report generation.

plugins.name: audio-editing
plugins.description: Claude Code plugin for audio editing, conversion, processing, and microphone management slash commands and agents.

plugins.name: image-editing
plugins.description: Claude Code plugin for image processing, photo editing, batch image operations, and visual media management.

plugins.name: video-editing
plugins.description: Claude Code plugin for video editing, transcoding, video processing, and multimedia workflow automation.

plugins.name: diary-planner
plugins.description: A workflow planning and time management template with agent definitions and slash commands for managing daily, weekly, and monthly schedules while maintaining connections between immediate tasks and longer-term objectives.

plugins.name: documentation
plugins.description: Claude Code plugin for documentation generation, technical writing, README creation, and documentation management workflows.

plugins.name: ideation
plugins.description: Claude Code plugin for brainstorming, idea generation, project planning, and creative problem-solving workflows.

plugins.name: learning
plugins.description: Claude Code plugin for learning resources, skill development, educational content creation, and knowledge management.

plugins.name: seo
plugins.description: Claude Code plugin for SEO optimization, meta tag management, and search engine optimization workflows.

plugins.name: tech-research
plugins.description: Claude Code plugin for technology research, competitive analysis, technical documentation retrieval, and research workflows.

plugins.name: home-assistant-manager
plugins.description: A comprehensive Home Assistant OS management template with 20+ slash commands for health monitoring, backup management, integration support, network diagnostics, maintenance operations, device management, and automation assistance.

plugins.name: files-and-folder-org
plugins.description: Claude Code plugin for file system organization, folder structure optimization, and file management automation workflows.

plugins.name: lan-manager
plugins.description: A specialized workspace for network system administration on local area networks, providing tools and scripts for LAN scanning, device discovery, device management, and network operations with context-aware topology information.

plugins.name: linux-desktop
plugins.description: Claude Code plugin for Linux desktop environment management, KDE/Plasma configuration, and desktop system administration.

plugins.name: linux-server
plugins.description: Claude Code plugin for Linux server administration, service management, and server infrastructure workflows.

plugins.name: security-checkup
plugins.description: Claude Code plugin for security audits, vulnerability scanning, firewall configuration, and system security hardening workflows.

plugins.name: server-management
plugins.description: Claude Code plugin for server infrastructure management, monitoring, deployment, and server administration workflows.

plugins.name: system
plugins.description: Claude Code plugin for system administration, hardware profiling, backup management, and general system maintenance workflows.

plugins.name: writing-editing
plugins.description: Claude Code plugin for writing assistance, proofreading, style editing, and text transformation workflows.
